Submodules¶

amazons.algorithms.minimax.history_table.history_table module¶

class amazons.algorithms.minimax.history_table.history_table.HistoryTable(name)¶

Bases: object

Table to register and recover evaluations of moves

Attributes:

name: name of the instance of the history table (also name to be saved with pickle module) moves_table: table to register amazons moves arrows_table: table to register arrow shots

get_rating(move)¶

Method to recover the rating of a move :param move: move to recover its evaluation :return: evaluation for the move

load_table()¶

Method to deserialize the table :return: None

save_table()¶

Method to serialize the table :return: None

update_rating(move, weight)¶

Method to update the rating of a move :param move: :param weight: :return:
